original: Imagine floating on the edge of nothingness.
translated: 想象一下，漂浮在虚无的边缘。

original: You are, for a microsecond, weightless. Then suddenly plunging back to reality, knowing you will never reach that high again. Welcome to amateur aeronautics and space exploration. Just as safe as NASA's shuttle missions, except at low cost and for profit!
translated: 在那一瞬间，你是失重的。然后，突然跌回现实，知道自己再也不会达到那样的高度了。欢迎来到业余航天和宇宙探索的行列。这和国家航空航天局的航天飞机任务一样安全，只是成本更低，且是商业化的。

original: Join the 60-mile high club!
translated: 加入60英里高空俱乐部吧！
只要25万美元！

original: Completely safe!*
translated: 绝对安全！*

original: Penetrating new barriers.
translated: 突破新的屏障。

original: Going where no amateur rocket has gone before.
translated: 飞向民营火箭未曾达到的高度。

original: The forbidden frontier.
translated: 被禁锢的边疆。

original: Welcome to the future.
translated: 欢迎来到未来。

original: It is a future where the super-wealthy pay a quarter of a million dollars to float around in their own vomit for five minutes. Jefferson Springfield Jr. founded Highmen Space Tours in 2004 with one clear mission: to make space travel accessible to the rich and famous while taking a cut and posing for some fantastic photo ops. Thousands of Vinewood actors, celebrity heiresses, boy band members, soccer players and hedge fund managers have pre-booked their seats on Spacetrotter2 and all we have to do now is find a way to make it work without turning everybody on board into molten goo. In the meantime, we will continue with our approach of unveiling flashy prototypes in mega-hyped publicity stunts, some of which blow up on the launch pad.
translated: 这是一个富豪们花25万美元，就能在自己的呕吐物周围漂浮5分钟的未来。Jefferson Springfield Jr.于2004年创立了Highmen太空之旅公司，其目标很明确：让富人和名人可以进行太空旅行，并从中获利，拍出一些精彩的照片。数以千计的好麦坞演员、知名富二代、男子乐队成员、足球运动员和对冲基金经理已经预订了他们在Spacetrotter2飞船上的座位。当务之急是设法将计划化为现实，还要避免将乘客变成肉泥。同时，我们将继续在炒作的大型宣传活动中推出华丽的原型机，部分原型机会在发射台上炸毁。

original: Exciting stuff! Space just went private!
translated: 激动人心的事！太空也能私有化了！

original: *unconfirmed until first flight
translated: *首航之后方可确认

original: Click here to find out more
translated: 点击此处获取更多详情

original: Highmen Space Tours is a fully-owned subsidiary of the Highmen Group.
translated: Highmen太空之旅是Highmen集团的全资子公司。

original: Highmen Space Miles
translated: Highmen太空里程

original: Every flight with Highmen Space Tours will earn you space miles that can be redeemed for a wide range of heavily-branded Highmen products, including Arctic camping gear, submarine rides, base-jumping expeditions and ceremonial urns.
translated: 每一次的Highmen太空之旅都将为您累计太空里程，这些里程可以用来兑换各类Highmen品牌产品，包括北极露营装备、潜艇旅行、跳伞探险和仪式用骨灰盒。

original: Checking in...
translated: 办理登机手续...

original: Highmen has already started building Spaceports in impossible-to-get-to desert locations around the world where nosy reporters and safety inspectors whither from the heat and turn back.   In keeping with the proven model of the airline industry, passengers should expect degrading and draconian invasions of privacy at every stage of their spaceport experience.    Please check in at least two hours before take-off and ensure that all orifices capable of waste discharge are properly sealed with the provided Highmen Space Tours hi-temperature duct tape. This will prevent your fellow amateur astronauts from floating around in your trouser chili because you shit your pants on re-entry.
translated: Highmen集团已经开始在世界各地难以到达的沙漠地区建造发射基地，那里的酷热会让好管闲事的记者和安全检查人员落荒而逃。为了与航空业的成熟模式保持一致，乘客们应该了解，他们在发射基地体验到的每一个环节都会遇到有辱人格且严重的隐私侵犯行为。请在起飞前至少两小时办理登机手续，并确保身上所有排泄的孔口都已用Highmen太空之旅提供的高温布基胶带密封严实。这样有助于防止重返大气层时发生意外，即便有人拉裤子了，也不至于使所有业余宇航员被飘散的排泄物包围。

original: Latest news
translated: 近期新闻

original: GalaxyTrotter2 unveiled. Small steps for man. A giant leap for capitalism.
translated: GalaxyTrotter2号飞船公布。这是人类的一小步，资本主义的一大步。

original: First he took over the world. Now he's taking over the universe, ensuring that the Highmen logo will be on everything from tit-implants to tasers. The latest prototype for Jefferson Springfield Jr's commercial spacecraft was unveiled this week in a fanfare of glitz and hype designed to divert attention away from the fact that Highmen can't get any sober pilots to agree to the inaugural attempt.
translated: 一开始他接管了世界。现在他正在接管全宇宙，以确保Highmen的标志将出现在从乳房假体到电击枪的所有东西上。在本周的一场浮华和炒作的发布会上，Jefferson Springfield Jr揭开了他商业航天器的最新原型机的面纱。但其目的在于转移人们的注意力，因为理智的飞行员都不会接受帮Highmen公司进行首次试飞的工作。

original: In a press briefing, Springfield asserted, "Billions of dollars of tax-payers' money later and the US space program is no further along than it was 40 years ago. All they do on the space station is shit in bags and watch it blow out the airlock. How can you explore space trapped in a tin can with foreigners from countries we don't even like? Weren't we supposed to be spending our spring breaks binge-drinking on the moon? Do I have to do everything myself?" Springfield told reporters while stroking his beard and laughing maniacally.
translated: 在一场新闻发布会上，Springfield坚称：「花了纳税人的数十亿美元之后，美国的太空计划相比40年前并没有任何进步。空间站的宇航员只会在袋子里拉屎，然后看着它从气闸里飞出去。和一点都不喜欢的国家的外国人一起闷在铁罐子里，这还怎么探索太空？我们的春假不是应该用来在月球上狂饮一番吗？难道每件事都要我亲自去做吗？」Springfield抚摸着胡子，狂笑着对记者如是说。

original: Book your bachelor party now!
translated: 现在就预订您的单身派对吧！

original: 4 men, 2 strippers, 0 gravity. Imagine a bachelor party with a different atmosphere. Remember, in space, you can actually spin the lucky lady during a rotisserie party.
translated: 4位男士，2位脱衣舞娘，0重力。想象一个气氛不同的单身派对。记住，在太空中，你真的可以在旋转派对里旋转幸运女士。

original: What happens in space stays in space!*
translated: 太空中发生的事只会留在太空！*

original: *HIV does not stay in space
translated: *艾滋病不会留在太空
